Issue Name: FRS
Issue Description: PO e mail facility. Settlement detail statement for suppliers. | Ability to have different pricing structures for different departments | Item movement history | Dealer payable age analysis | If there is any captured drug allergy in the EMR (If the prescription contain a drug allergic to the patient system should give a warning) | The system should list all available drugs of the generic name in 1st in latest expiry date. (1st item of the list should be the item with the shortest expiry date) | The pharmacist should be able to add, update, and modify drug details. | The system should however allow the users to re-print these labels if required, and allow the users to determine the number required for the reprint, although this should again be defaulted to one. | The system should by default print only one label per prescribed drug. | There must be facility to enable label printing. | If there have been medication orders earlier for the same inpatient, then medications issued to the patient must be checked for inclusion of these drugs and warnings issued where appropriate. | The system always displays the generic with the brand name. | If a particular brand is not available in the stock, the system should display the available same brand names of the drug. Substitutes | The system should enable users to enter all medications into the system from the same screen. | Provision for recording physical stock check figures and generating variance reports and automatic adjustments. | Pharmacy system also allows accepting donated, free or discounted goods at cost determined by the management or at standard cost. | Stock balance will be updated immediately on confirmation of transaction Facilitates procurement of stocks based on re-order levels Expired item tracking
